configurationParameter.name: anaforaDirectory
configurationParameter.description: root directory of the Anafora-annotated files, with one subdirectory for each annotated file

configurationParameter.name: anaforaSuffixes
configurationParameter.description: list of suffixes that might be added to a file name to identify the Anafora XML annotations file; only the first suffix corresponding to a file will be used
